alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Comanche, southeastern Kiowa and north central Tillman Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Manitou, moving northeast at 40 mph. Another thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Indiahoma. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cache, Indiahoma, Meers, southwestern Fort Sill, Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Doris Campground, and The Visitor Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
